title: When the enemy team starts grouping before yours

replies.body: And we all know what happens when Taric is ganking Ezreal. ',:)
http://img15.deviantart.net/6775/i/2015/046/0/4/armor_of_the_fifth_age_ezreal_by_kittyconqueso-d8i5kyb.png
I think I'm in love.

st patricks day skin
As an ADC main, I feel this resonating with my soul. {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

Part of the reason I play Quinn, if done right, here is a depiction of what the enemy team should look like by the time they're able to start grouping

https://media.giphy.com/media/5xaOcLtWY8SzVCb7JAs/giphy.gif
-1 plays Quinn
http://i.imgur.com/YX6ZTJ2.gif?noredirect
I should pick up Quinn again, she was a fun adc.
Quinn isn't an ADC, if you're playing her bot lane it should be as a kill lane, with the goal to shut down the enemy ADC.

It usually was a kill lane when I played her before, so I think me and my brother can manage.

Also, what makes her not an adc? Her update made it possible for her to actually be viable bot lane, I thought.

The update actually made her more viable as a mid laner, as an ADC she has short range but doesn't have the same safety tools that other short range ADCs have like {{champion:15}}  spellshield or {{champion:67}}  tumble+stealth, she's more suited to dueling or kiting single enemies or waiting for an opportunity to kill key targets on the enemy back line.

Her highest winrate build right now is {{item:3142}} {{item:3147}} {{item:3156}}, though she does have a multitude of other builds that work in other situations. 

If you play her as an ADC you still need to position and wait for openings like an assassin to avoid just getting blown up.

If you do take her bot lane with a duo you could try with a support {{champion:60}}, her kit complements {{champion:133}}s extremely well.

I actually want to try her mid, that sounds pretty cool.

Elise support sounds like it could be the new way to play her. It honestly sounds pretty fun.

Do you think going the traditional adc build when you go Quinn mid would work just as well? Or is the armor pen required when you don't have a buddy with you at all times to set up kills?

Your full combo will 100-0 an enemy carry with the armor pen build, basically means that an enemy ADC can never split off from the group to farm a side lane or they just die. I've seen some people go {{item:3508}} {{item:3046}} {{item:3812}} for top lane, you could go {{item:3508}} {{item:3087}} for some extra wave clear, helps push out side lanes quicker before regrouping.
Ok, gotcha. Makes sense

It depends on how bursty the enemy team is though.

I was playing Cho the other day, Quinn ganked me, easy kill.

Then she ganks Veigar, easy kill.

Then she tries to engage once more on her botlane, Lucian + Brand blow her up, gg
She is incredibly squishy, probably all it took was one bard stun
